attributes.action: Remove this traitor Anjem Choudary and deport him from the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To reject the words of the Islamic fundamentalist Anjem Choudary as anti British. Banning one organization will not prevent this traitor from spreading his vile desires he has no place in the UK

rejection.details:
We do not accept petitions relating to an individual's circumstances. 
Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
